After seeing a similar thread on a football forum I decided to start it here.
 
 What is your favourite music types and musicians/singers?
 
 Although I do not play any musical instrument nor do I sing, music is one of the most important things in life IMO.
 
 My favourite types are:
 
 - World music ( Arabesque, Egyptian, Turkish, North African)
 - Movie Soundtrack ( Gladiator, Black Hawk Down, Lord of the Rings, Gangs of New York, Band of Brothers, The Last Samurai, Ronin, The Ghost and the Darkness)
 -Rock ( U2, Bruce Springsteen, Evanesence)
 -Jazz ( Jamie Cullum )
 -Reggae ( Bob Marley
 -Some Classical ( Andrea Bochelli )
 -Chillout 
 
 My favourite songs are:
 
 -All of Gladiator soundtrack
 -Into the West- LOTR Return of the King
 -41 shots (American skin)- Bruce Springsteen
 -Land of Hope and Dreams- Bruce Springsteen
 -Streets of Philadelphia- Bruce Springsteen
 -Barra Barra- from Black Hawk Down
 -Walk to the Water- U2
 -Your Blue Room- U2
 -Miss Sarajevo - U2 & Paverotti
 -Hands That Built America- U2
 -Ne Me Jugez Pas- from Arabic Groove
 -Salle De Moi- Euphoric Classic Chillout
 
 
 Please post your favourite and/or your comments! emoticon_xgood
